rules.natural: The team uses a drone or the team uses a camera trap.
The team monitors plant species, or it is not the case that the project has funding.
The team monitors animal species or the team does not monitor plant species.
Whenever a plant species is essential to the ecosystem, the team does not monitor animal species.
Under the condition that the project employs a botanist, the project employs an ecologist.
Provided that the project employs an ecologist, the ecologist is an expert.
If the ecologist follows guidelines, then under the condition that the project employs an ecologist, art conservation does not have funding.
Provided that the team requests an extension, then if the project is not successful, the project is halted.
If the team uses a camera trap, then the project is successful.
Provided that the team appeals the decision, then whenever the project is not successful, the project is halted.
Under the condition that the team submits a report, the team requests an extension.
The team submits a report or the team lodges a complaint.
Provided that the team lodges a complaint, the team provides evidence.
Under the condition that the team provides evidence, the team contacts the media.
Provided that the team contacts the media, the team appeals the decision.
If authorization is granted for a plant survey, then the team does not violate protocol.
Provided that authorization is granted for an animal survey, the team does not violate protocol.
Whenever the artwork is fragile, the artwork is valuable.
Under the condition that the project lacks funding, the project does not have funding.
Provided that the project loses funding, the project does not have funding.
If the team reports a shortfall, then the project lacks funding.
The team reports a shortfall or the team warns of closure.
Whenever the botanist is an expert, art conservation does not have funding.
Provided that the ecologist is an expert, the botanist is an expert.
If the director mandates a review, then under the condition that it is not the case that if the project is not successful then the project is halted, the project continues.
The team is approved for a plant survey or the team is approved for an animal survey.
Whenever the team is approved for an animal survey, the team does not violate protocol.
Under the condition that the tool damages the artwork, the tool restores the artwork.
If the conservator is authorized for an intervention, then under the condition that the tool damages the artwork, the tool does not restore the artwork.
Whenever it is not the case that if the team uses a drone then the project is successful, the team violates protocol.
Provided that it is not the case that authorization is granted for a plant survey or authorization is granted for an animal survey, authorization is denied for all surveys.
Under the condition that it is not the case that authorization is granted for a plant survey or authorization is granted for an animal survey, authorization is not denied for all surveys.
If it is not the case that if the team warns of closure then the project loses funding, then the agency overrides the closure.
Provided that it is not the case that if the team is approved for a plant survey then the team does not violate protocol, the team is pending review.

Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the team is approved for a plant survey then the team does not violate protocol, then the team is not pending review, the artwork is fragile.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the team is approved for a plant survey then the team does not violate protocol, then the team is not pending review, the tool damages the artwork.
Provided that the project is not successful, the project has funding.
Under the condition that the project is not successful, art conservation has funding.
Provided that the project is not successful, the project is not halted.
